page.title: 03LAND OWNERS
page.content: { Captain Lumsden}is the biggest single land owner in{Banchory-Devenick.}He is the laird. A lot of the land is rented out for farming and some of the houses and cottages on the estate are also rented out by him. Most of the other houses have a medium sized garden. There are a lot of farms in the area and moorland on the higher ground where it is not suitble for farming.There is marshland but some has been drained by farmers. Just a few new houses are allowed to be built and only on a site where there used to be an old building. Nearly all of Banchory-Devenick is countryside. The{Roman Catholic {College of Blairs}owns a lot of land as does{Auchlunies Estate.
